instruction: Come up with a clever way of baking a cake without using a traditional oven.
output: Using a slow cooker is one of the best alternatives for baking a cake without an oven. First, spray the pan with cooking spray and then line it with parchment paper. Then, combine all the ingredients in a bowl and pour it into the slow cooker. Place the lid over the pan and cook the cake on low for about 3-4 hours. Check the cake for readiness, before serving it.
